scripts.local: npx bun src/app.ts download && npx bun src/app.ts convert && npx bun src/app.ts codegen --output ../../src/lib/api
scripts.local:test: npx bun src/app.ts download && npx bun src/app.ts convert && npx bun src/app.ts codegen
scripts.remote: npx bun src/app.ts download --remote && npx bun src/app.ts convert && npx bun src/app.ts codegen --output ../../src/lib/api
scripts.remote:test: npx bun src/app.ts download --remote && npx bun src/app.ts convert && npx bun src/app.ts codegen
